cards.name: Grill Master Gary
cards.subtitle: Propane is Just a Suggestion
cards.flavorText: I told my wife the grill was her fault. She said 'that doesn't even make sense.' I said 'neither does your cooking.'

abilities.name: Flame On
abilities.description: Sets everything on fire. Including the neighbor's fence. Again.

cards.name: Thermostat Tyrant
cards.subtitle: 68°F or Death
cards.flavorText: The kids tried to touch it. I told them 'That's how you lose fingers.' They haven't tried since.

abilities.name: Temperature Lockdown
abilities.description: Knows when you touch it. From anywhere in the house.

abilities.name: Bill Rage
abilities.description: +500% anger when electric bill arrives

cards.name: New Balance Nathan
cards.subtitle: Fashion Forward Since 2004
cards.flavorText: The podiatrist said these are the only shoes that love me back. The marriage counselor said different.

abilities.name: Maximum Comfort
abilities.description: Has zero f*cks left to give about style

cards.name: Lawn Legend Larry
cards.subtitle: GET OFF MY LAWN
cards.flavorText: I've spent 20 years perfecting this grass. The HOA can suck my ass.

abilities.name: Grass Stare
abilities.description: Can detect a single imperfect blade from 100 yards

cards.name: Remote Control Randy
cards.subtitle: Don't Touch The Buttons
cards.flavorText: I'm not asleep, I'm just conducting important REM research.

abilities.name: Button Memory
abilities.description: Knows exactly which button you touched. Always.

cards.name: Handyman Hank
cards.subtitle: Duct Tape & WD-40
cards.flavorText: The plumber wanted $800. I fixed it myself for $15 and a trip to the ER.

abilities.name: YouTube Master
abilities.description: Watched a 10-minute video. Basically an expert now.

abilities.name: Hardware Store Wizard
abilities.description: Can navigate Home Depot blindfolded

cards.name: Bogey Bob
cards.subtitle: It's Not About The Score
cards.flavorText: I'd be better if my back didn't sound like a grenade going off every swing.

abilities.name: Infinite Mulligans
abilities.description: 'That one didn't count.' - Every single time.

cards.name: Cargo Shorts Carl
cards.subtitle: Pocket Dimension
cards.flavorText: 17 pockets and I still can't find my phone. It's in pocket 4. Always pocket 4.

abilities.name: Infinite Storage
abilities.description: Once pulled out a full grill. Nobody knows how.

abilities.name: Prepared Dad
abilities.description: Has exactly what you need. Eventually.

cards.name: Oil Change Oscar
cards.subtitle: 3,000 Miles or Whenever
cards.flavorText: That's not a leak, that's just the car marking its territory.

abilities.name: Engine Whisperer
abilities.description: Can diagnose problems by sound. Sometimes accurate.

cards.name: TPS Report Terry
cards.subtitle: Did You Get The Memo?
cards.flavorText: I'd explain corporate synergy, but I'd have to kill you. Or bore you. Same thing.

abilities.name: Meeting Survivor
abilities.description: Can endure 4-hour meetings about nothing

cards.name: Skateboard Scott
cards.subtitle: The Cool Dad (Confirmed)
cards.flavorText: I was doing kickflips before you were born. Well, attempting them. In my mind.

abilities.name: Radical Recall
abilities.description: Remembers every 90s slang word. Uses them wrong anyway.

abilities.name: Hip Injury Risk
abilities.description: 100% chance of throwing back out

cards.name: Soccer Stan
cards.subtitle: sideline General
cards.flavorText: HUSTLE! HUSTLE! ...Sorry, I'm projecting my unfulfilled dreams.

abilities.name: Orange Slice Provider
abilities.description: The most important job on the field

cards.name: Secret Recipe Rick
cards.subtitle: The Secret Is Butter
cards.flavorText: The secret ingredient? Love. And enough butter to kill a horse.

abilities.name: Taste Memory
abilities.description: Can recreate any dish. Usually better.

abilities.name: Kiss The Cook
abilities.description: +50 defense when wearing apron

cards.name: Costco Craig
cards.subtitle: Bulk Buy Boss
cards.flavorText: We don't NEED 47 rolls of toilet paper, but at that price, we'd be stupid not to.

abilities.name: Sample Radar
abilities.description: Can detect free samples from 3 aisles away

abilities.name: Hot Dog Devotion
abilities.description: The $1.50 combo is sacred. DO NOT QUESTION IT.

cards.name: Christmas Clark
cards.subtitle: Decorate Or Die
cards.flavorText: The neighbors said my lights were 'too bright.' I added 5,000 more. They've since moved.

abilities.name: Ladder Courage
abilities.description: No roof is too high. No hospital visit too expensive.

abilities.name: Extension Cord Master
abilities.description: Can daisy-chain 47 power strips. Fire department is on speed dial.

cards.name: The Ultimate Dad
cards.subtitle: Hi Hungry, I'm Dad
cards.flavorText: I brought you into this world, and I'll take you out. After I finish this burger.

abilities.name: Dad Joke Mastery
abilities.description: Every joke lands. The groans are deafening.

abilities.name: Universal Remote
abilities.description: Controls everything. Even you.

abilities.name: Infinite Wisdom
abilities.description: Actually knows everything (confirmed by him)

cards.name: WiFi Wizard Walter
cards.subtitle: Have You Tried Turning It Off?
cards.flavorText: I changed the password again. Read the sticky note on the fridge. No, the other one.

abilities.name: Router Reboot
abilities.description: Fixes 90% of problems. The other 10%? More rebooting.

cards.name: Smoker Steve
cards.subtitle: Low & Slow Legend
cards.flavorText: 12 hours? That's just getting started. The meat isn't done until I say it's done. Or until tomorrow.

abilities.name: Smoke Ring Summoner
abilities.description: Perfect smoke ring. Every. Single. Time.

abilities.name: Patience of a Saint
abilities.description: Will wait 18 hours for perfect brisket. Will not wait 5 minutes for you.

cards.name: Minivan Mike
cards.subtitle: Swagger Wagon Commander
cards.flavorText: It's not a minivan, it's a mobile command center with built-in goldfish cracker storage.

abilities.name: Snack Compartment
abilities.description: Emergency rations for any crisis (all 5 flavors)

cards.name: Recliner Randy
cards.subtitle: Horizontal Life Evaluation
cards.flavorText: This isn't sleeping. This is strategic consciousness pause.

abilities.name: Power Nap
abilities.description: 20 minutes. Fully recharged. Still tired.

abilities.name: Snore Denial
abilities.description: Claims to never snore. Recording suggests otherwise.

cards.name: Fertilizer Fred
cards.subtitle: Grass Growth Guru
cards.flavorText: The secret is in the nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium ratio. Trust me, I have a degree. From YouTube.

abilities.name: Dandelion Destroyer
abilities.description: Can spot a weed from a moving vehicle

cards.name: LinkedIn Larry
cards.subtitle: Humble Brag Master
cards.flavorText: Excited to announce that I'm excited to announce that I'm excited to announce that I'm exhausted.

abilities.name: Infinite Humble Brag
abilities.description: Every post is secretly an achievement

cards.name: Band Dad Brad
cards.subtitle: Almost Got Signed
cards.flavorText: We almost got signed. ALMOST. The record label just 'didn't get our vision.' 20 years ago.

abilities.name: Air Guitar God
abilities.description: Can shred invisible strings like nobody's business

cards.name: Classic Car Craig
cards.subtitle: It's A Classic, Not A Clunker
cards.flavorText: They don't make 'em like they used to. Thank God. These things are death traps. But she's beautiful.

abilities.name: Part Archaeologist
abilities.description: Can find discontinued parts from the Cold War era

abilities.name: Weekend Warrior
abilities.description: Has been 'almost done' for 7 years. Trust me though.

cards.name: Breakfast King Keith
cards.subtitle: Pancake Perfectionist
cards.flavorText: Saturday morning pancakes are non-negotiable. Burn them and you're disowned.

abilities.name: Flip Master
abilities.description: Never dropped a pancake. The walls disagree.

cards.name: Weber Genesis Grill
cards.subtitle: The Sacred Flame
cards.flavorText: Four burners of pure power. Side burner for the beans. This is why your dad loves you.

abilities.name: Perfect Heat Distribution
abilities.description: No hot spots. Ever. The neighbors are jealous.

cards.name: La-Z-Boy Throne
cards.subtitle: Seat of Power
cards.flavorText: Built-in cup holders. Heated massage. This is the endgame. This is what we work for.

abilities.name: Infinite Recline
abilities.description: Adjusts to any position. Even ones that shouldn't exist.

cards.name: Craftsman Toolbox
cards.subtitle: Inherited From Grandpa
cards.flavorText: Every tool has a story. Most involve grandpa swearing. A lot.

abilities.name: Right Tool, Right Job
abilities.description: Has exactly what you need. If you can find it.

cards.name: Cargo Shorts of Holding
cards.subtitle: Pocket Dimension
cards.flavorText: 17 pockets. Each one a mystery. Still can't find my keys though.

abilities.name: Defies Physics
abilities.description: Scientists have studied them. They were confused.

cards.name: The Thermostat
cards.subtitle: Source of Marital Discord
cards.flavorText: He who controls the thermostat, controls the household. The negotiations never end.

abilities.name: Temperature Lock
abilities.description: Biometric security. Only the worthy may adjust.

abilities.name: Bill Display
abilities.description: Shows real-time energy cost. Wife still changes it.

cards.name: Propane Paul
cards.subtitle: Tank Tender
cards.flavorText: Taste the meat, not the heat. Also, ignore the gas smell. That's normal. Probably.

abilities.name: Tank Gauge Intuition
abilities.description: Knows exactly how many burgers remain. To the decimal.

cards.name: YouTube Tutorial Tom
cards.subtitle: 10 Minutes To Expert
cards.flavorText: I watched a 10-minute video. I'm basically a professional now. What could go wrong?

abilities.name: Video Pause Master
abilities.description: Can follow tutorials perfectly. Results may vary.

cards.name: Country Club Chad
cards.subtitle: Back Nine Boss
cards.flavorText: It's not about winning, it's about the business deals on the back nine. And the drinking. Mostly the drinking.

abilities.name: Networking Drive
abilities.description: Every round is a business opportunity. Somehow.

cards.name: Little League Lou
cards.subtitle: Dugout Dynamo
cards.flavorText: Keep your eye on the ball! No, THE OTHER BALL! You know what, just don't quit.

abilities.name: Encouragement Aura
abilities.description: 'Good job!' is his battle cry. Even when you suck.

cards.name: Riding Mower Rex
cards.subtitle: Lawn Cavalry
cards.flavorText: Zero-turn radius. Maximum dad satisfaction. The neighbors are both impressed and concerned.

abilities.name: Stripe Perfection
abilities.description: Creates MLB-quality lawn patterns. The HOA is confused.

abilities.name: Cup Holder Tech
abilities.description: Never spills a beverage. Even at full speed.

cards.name: World's Best Dad Mug
cards.subtitle: Unverified but Emotional
cards.flavorText: Scientifically unverified, emotionally accurate. Don't question it.

abilities.name: Morning Confidence
abilities.description: Coffee tastes 47% better from this mug. Confirmed.

cards.name: Oakley Wraparounds
cards.subtitle: Tactical Eye Protection
cards.flavorText: Polarized lenses for maximum fish-spotting. Also hides the eye rolls from your wife.

abilities.name: Glare Immunity
abilities.description: Never squints. Even directly at the sun.

cards.name: Cell Phone Holster
cards.subtitle: Quick Draw
cards.flavorText: Quick draw texting. Hands-free hip storage. The kids are embarrassed. Good.

abilities.name: Always Accessible
abilities.description: Never misses a call (or pretends not to)

cards.name: Hawaiian Shirt Harry
cards.subtitle: Casual Friday Every Day
cards.flavorText: Every day is casual Friday when you give up on life. This shirt has seen things.

abilities.name: Permanent Vacation
abilities.description: Brings beach energy to any situation. Even funerals.

cards.name: Costco Hot Dog
cards.subtitle: The $1.50 Legend
cards.flavorText: Price hasn't changed since 1985. Neither has the quality. Or the digestion time.

abilities.name: Infinite Value
abilities.description: Includes a drink. ALWAYS. Don't ask questions.

cards.name: Conference Call Carl
cards.subtitle: You're On Mute
cards.flavorText: You're on mute. YOU'RE ON MUTE. YES, STILL. OK I'LL JUST EMAIL YOU.

abilities.name: Background Blur
abilities.description: Hides the chaos. Kids screaming, wife judging, all invisible.

cards.name: SportsCenter Sam
cards.subtitle: Highlight Historian
cards.flavorText: Did you see that play? Let me show you. Again. And again. Until you get it.

abilities.name: Stat Recall
abilities.description: Remembers every sports statistic since 1987. Useless for everything else.

cards.name: IPA Ian
cards.subtitle: Hop Head Supreme
cards.flavorText: You can really taste the notes of pine, citrus, and judgment of anyone drinking light beer.

abilities.name: Hop Detection
abilities.description: Can identify any hop variety blindfolded. It's a curse.

abilities.name: Brewery Map
abilities.description: Knows every craft brewery within 50 miles. Every one.

cards.name: Vintage Vinyl Vince
cards.subtitle: Analog Audiophile
cards.flavorText: You just can't replicate the warmth of vinyl. Or the crackle. Especially the crackle. That's the $800 talking.

abilities.name: Album Knowledge
abilities.description: Knows every B-side ever pressed. It's impressive. Also sad.

cards.name: Kiss The Cook Apron
cards.subtitle: Grill Armor
cards.flavorText: Instructions unclear. Kissed the grill instead. Lips still numb.

abilities.name: Splatter Shield
abilities.description: Protects good shirts from grease. All 3 of them.

cards.name: Fourth of July Frank
cards.subtitle: Patriotic Pyro
cards.flavorText: These are totally legal. Probably. Don't tell mom. Or the police. Especially the police.

abilities.name: Firework Choreographer
abilities.description: Times every explosion perfectly. The ER knows him by name.

cards.name: Home Depot Hero
cards.subtitle: Aisle Navigator
cards.flavorText: I came for one screw. Left with a new table saw. And a project. And divorce papers.

abilities.name: Project Creep
abilities.description: Every small fix becomes a renovation. Every single time.

cards.name: Smart Home Steve
cards.subtitle: IoT Overlord
cards.flavorText: Alexa, tell the kids dinner is ready. ALEXA. ALEXA! GODDAMNIT

abilities.name: Voice Control Freak
abilities.description: Controls everything by yelling at it. Very therapeutic.

abilities.name: App Overload
abilities.description: Has 47 apps for 47 devices. Phone hates him.

cards.name: White Crew Socks
cards.subtitle: Ankle Armor
cards.flavorText: Pulled up high. As nature intended. As God intended.

abilities.name: Sandal Synergy
abilities.description: Pairs perfectly with any sandal. The horror of neighbors is real.

cards.name: New Balance 608s
cards.subtitle: The Dad Shoe
cards.flavorText: Podiatrist approved. Fashion police disapproved. Dad approved.

abilities.name: All-Day Comfort
abilities.description: Can walk Costco for 6 hours. Feet feel like clouds.

cards.name: DadPass Legend
cards.subtitle: Pass Holder Supreme
cards.flavorText: He didn't just buy the pass. He BECAME the pass. Nowhere is safe from his daily rewards.

abilities.name: Premium Pass
abilities.description: All stats are maxed out. Because you paid $4.99 and you deserve it.

abilities.name: Daily Rewards
abilities.description: Unlocks premium rewards every 3 days. The other dads are jealous.

cards.name: Ultimate DadPass Dad
cards.subtitle: The Final Tier
cards.flavorText: 30 days of dedication. 30 tiers conquered. 10 premium packs. You are now the DadPass Dad.

abilities.name: Mythic Pass
abilities.description: Grants prismatic holo effect to all packs opened. Pure dad energy.

abilities.name: Tier 30 Mastery
abilities.description: Auto-awards daily rewards even when you forget to log in. The pass remembers.

abilities.name: Premium For Life
abilities.description: All future DadPass rewards are automatically claimed. Forever.

cards.name: Smoke Master Sam
cards.subtitle: The Low and Slow Prophet
cards.flavorText: If you're lookin', you ain't cookin'. This brisket has been going for 18 hours. Don't touch the lid.

abilities.name: Bark Whisperer
abilities.description: Achieves perfect crust consistency every time. Neighbors weep with joy.

cards.name: Pool Side Paul
cards.subtitle: Guardian of the Deep End
cards.flavorText: NO RUNNING! I just balanced the pH levels. One cannonball and you're banned for an hour.

abilities.name: Chemical Balance
abilities.description: Can detect 1.5ppm chlorine by scent alone.

cards.name: Mosquito Magnet Mike
cards.subtitle: Sacrificing Blood for the Yard
cards.flavorText: They just love my Type-O blood. I've been bitten through my denim. It's fine. Keep eating.

abilities.name: Human Shield
abilities.description: Attracts all local insects, sparing other dads in the radius.

cards.name: Sunburn Stan
cards.subtitle: Lobster-Tinted Leisure
cards.flavorText: It'll turn into a tan tomorrow. I don't need 'SPF 50'—that's just fancy lotion.

abilities.name: Solar Absorption
abilities.description: Gains +10 Grill Skill when skin matches the medium-rare steak.

cards.name: Flip Flop Floyd
cards.subtitle: The Rhythmic Slap of Summer
cards.flavorText: Slap. Slap. Slap. The sound of a man who hasn't worn real shoes since May.

abilities.name: Beach Stealth
abilities.description: Can be heard from 3 houses away. Stealth is impossible.

cards.name: Cooler King Kevin
cards.subtitle: The Ice Must Flow
cards.flavorText: Pre-chilled with dry ice for 24 hours. This cooler costs more than my first car.

abilities.name: Arctic Retention
abilities.description: Keep drinks cold for 10 days. Or until Kevin opens it to show off the ice.

cards.name: Back Deck Barry
cards.subtitle: Outdoor Napping Specialist
cards.flavorText: I'm not sleeping, I'm just resting my eyes. And listening to the birds. And snoring rhythmically.

abilities.name: Horizontal Authority
abilities.description: Commands the entire deck from a lying position.

cards.name: Tongs-Clicking Tim
cards.subtitle: Checking the Calibration
cards.flavorText: *Click click* Yep, they still work. *Click click* Just checking. Gotta be sure.

abilities.name: Calibration Click
abilities.description: Must click tongs twice before any interaction. Increases focus.

cards.name: Marinade Mark
cards.subtitle: 24 Hours of Flavor Prep
cards.flavorText: It's a secret blend of 14 spices and a very specific vinegar I found in Vermont.

abilities.name: Deep Soak
abilities.description: Flavor penetrates to the molecular level. Your tongue isn't ready.

cards.name: Charcoal Charlie
cards.subtitle: Analog Heat Enthusiast
cards.flavorText: Gas is for quitters. If I don't smell like a forest fire, did I even cook?

abilities.name: Chimney Mastery
abilities.description: Can light coals in a hurricane with one match and a newspaper.

cards.name: Cornhole Chris
cards.subtitle: The Beanbag Sniper
cards.flavorText: Four bagger. All air mail. I've been practicing in the garage since February.

abilities.name: The Slide
abilities.description: Bags always find the hole, regardless of friction levels.

cards.name: Ladder Ball Larry
cards.subtitle: Tangled in Plastic
cards.flavorText: It's all in the wrist. If you wrap it on the top bar, it's worth three. I don't make the rules, I just enforce them.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Bolas wrap around anything. Especially the neighbor's dog.

cards.name: Badminton Brad
cards.subtitle: Intense Backyard Athletics
cards.flavorText: Smashed it! That's a point! Why is everyone looking at me like that? It's a competitive sport!

abilities.name: Shuttlecock Smash
abilities.description: Deploys unnecessary athletic intensity in a low-stakes environment.

cards.name: Water Balloon Walter
cards.subtitle: Tactical Hydration Deployment
cards.flavorText: Target locked. Ready the launchers. This is going to be a cold summer for the kids.

abilities.name: Rapid Refill
abilities.description: Can fill 100 balloons in 60 seconds. The lawn is now a swamp.

cards.name: Slip n Slide Sid
cards.subtitle: Defying Friction
cards.flavorText: Watch this! The chiropractor is already on speed dial. BANZAI!

abilities.name: Hydroplaning
abilities.description: Slides twice as far as physics should allow. Ignores grass stains.

cards.name: Citronella Cy
cards.subtitle: The Waxy Shield
cards.flavorText: Smells like lemon and broken dreams. But at least the mosquitoes are only mildly annoyed.

abilities.name: Lemon Scent
abilities.description: Creates a 5-foot radius of questionable protection.

cards.name: Tiki Torch Tom
cards.subtitle: Backyard Illumination Expert
cards.flavorText: It's all about the ambiance. And the open flame near a wooden fence. Living on the edge.

abilities.name: Island Vibe
abilities.description: Transforms any midwestern backyard into a poorly lit tropical paradise.

cards.name: Light Beer Bill
cards.subtitle: Hydration is Mostly Water
cards.flavorText: It's basically water. I can drink these all day. And I will. Watch me.

abilities.name: Infinite Cooler
abilities.description: Can consume 24 cans without losing the ability to talk about the weather.

cards.name: Zucchini Zeus
cards.subtitle: The Garden Over-Producer
cards.flavorText: Take one. Please. Take five. I have 400 more. My family is tired of zucchini bread. My neighbors are hiding.

abilities.name: Bumper Crop
abilities.description: Generates 50x more vegetables than any human could possibly consume.

cards.name: Burger Builder Bob
cards.subtitle: Architect of the Bun
cards.flavorText: The structural integrity of the lettuce is key. One slip and the whole system collapses. It's engineering, really.

abilities.name: Structural Topping
abilities.description: Burgers never fall apart. Defies the laws of condiments.

cards.name: Hot Dog Harry
cards.subtitle: Tube Meat Traditionalist
cards.flavorText: Ketchup on a hot dog? Not in this house. Mustard or GTFO. That's the law.

abilities.name: Relish Rush
abilities.description: Consumption speed increases by 300% when mustard is present.

cards.name: Condiment Craig
cards.subtitle: The Mustard Militia
cards.flavorText: I have 47 types of hot sauce and a mustard from a village in France that doesn't exist anymore.

abilities.name: Sauce Flex
abilities.description: Increases flavor of any nearby food by 200%. Also increases heartburn.

cards.name: Ice Run Ian
cards.subtitle: The Essential Supply Driver
cards.flavorText: We're out of ice. I'll be back in 10 minutes. *Comes back 40 minutes later with ice and a new tool he didn't need.*

abilities.name: Convenience Orbit
abilities.description: Can find a gas station with good ice in any zip code.

cards.name: Shade Seeker Steve
cards.subtitle: Chasing the Shadow
cards.flavorText: Move the chair three feet to the left. The sun is chasing me. I'm not moving, the universe is.

abilities.name: Shadow Calculation
abilities.description: Predicts sun movement with 99.9% accuracy. Finds the coldest spot in the yard.

cards.name: Sprinkler Spencer
cards.subtitle: Yard Irrigation Veteran
cards.flavorText: I've got the timing down. 5am for the front, 6am for the back. Don't walk on the sidewalk. You've been warned.

abilities.name: Arc Adjustment
abilities.description: Sets the perfect 180-degree spray. Sidewalk stays bone dry.

cards.name: Lawn Chair Leon
cards.subtitle: Webbed Throne Holder
cards.flavorText: This aluminum frame has supported me through three decades of parades and soccer games. It stays.

abilities.name: Webbed Comfort
abilities.description: Leaves a permanent grid pattern on the user's back. Sign of a true summer.

cards.name: Patriotic Pete
cards.subtitle: The Flag-Waver
cards.flavorText: Stars and stripes! And burgers! And liberty! Why are you crying? It's just a parade!

abilities.name: Eagle Screech
abilities.description: Increases morale of all nearby dads by 1776%.

cards.name: Bug Zapper Ben
cards.subtitle: The Electric Blue Judge
cards.flavorText: *Zap* Got one. *Zap zap* That was a big one. The sound of victory.

abilities.name: Shock Value
abilities.description: The blue glow provides a hypnotic and deadly ambiance.

cards.name: Fire Pit Fred
cards.subtitle: Storytelling in the Smoke
cards.flavorText: The smoke follows beauty, that's what my dad used to say. *Coughs violently while sitting in the smoke.*

abilities.name: Ember Mastery
abilities.description: Can keep a fire going for 14 hours with three logs and a dream.

cards.name: Inflatable Island Ivan
cards.subtitle: Captain of the Vinyl Raft
cards.flavorText: This float has 6 cup holders and a built-in cooler. I am the king of this 12-foot pool.

abilities.name: Drift Away
abilities.description: Slowly moves away from all responsibilities. Unstoppable.
